Amazon Customer
Good quality diapers at affordable price
Reviewed in India on 2 September 2025
Size: MediumUnit Count: 72Verified Purchase
Using these diapers since almost last one year for my newborn twins. As per my experience, these diapers absorb pee until max 6 hrs, post that they start leaking. So any interested buyers need to consider this. Comfort & quality is good for the babies, does not get any rashes. Thank you.

How are ratings calculated?
Customers say
Customers have mixed opinions about these baby diapers, with some finding them good quality and comfortable, while others report poor quality and discomfort. The absorbency receives mixed feedback - while some praise its capacity, others say it doesn't absorb even a single pee. Skin rashes are a concern, with some customers reporting rashes while others say they're rash-free. Moreover, the size receives criticism for being very small, and customers disagree on the softness, with some finding them gentle on skin while others describe them as rough. Additionally, customers disagree on the value for money, with some finding them good for price while others consider them not worth the cost.

images.alt: Mamypoko Pants All Night Absorb| Pant Style Baby Diapers Large Size(L), 66 Count, Ideal for 9-14Kgs|+50% Wider and Repeated Absorption for All Night 12hr Protection from Leakage, Prevents Heaviness.

specifications.50% Wider Criss Cross: New Wider Crisscross technology helps urine to spread equally and evenly on the top surface of the sheet to provide repeated absorption upto 7 glasses.
specifications.Upto 12 Hrs Absorption: With Wider Criss Cross and repeated absorption, top sheet remains dry and gives upto 12 Hrs absorption ensuring uninterupted sleep.
specifications.Prevents Leakage and Heaviness: Even absorbtion of urine prevents the diaper from becoming heavy & gives your baby a comforable sleep.
specifications.Availables in Size: Newborn, Small, Medium, Large, XL, XXL diapers.
